lead_paragraph: Many women are abandoning decades of party loyalty, calling Mr. Trump emotionally unfit for the presidency and a menace to national security.

byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti and Megan Thee-Brenan contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and AMY CHOZICK

headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Women Are Retreating From Nominee
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Support Among Republican Women Starts to Slide

snippet: Many women are abandoning decades of party loyalty, calling Mr. Trump emotionally unfit for the presidency and a menace to national security....
abstract: Republican women, both high-profile politicians and ordinary voters, are withdrawing their support from Donald J Trump following series of inflammatory comments from candidate; Trump's lead over Hillary Clinton with Republican women voters has fallen by 13 percent since nominating conventions, to alarm of Trump campaign.
